name: fabcar-contract
description: fabcar chaincode implemented in node.js using the new contract API

scripts.install-chaincode: docker exec cli peer chaincode install -n fabcar-contract -v 0 -p /tmp/fabcar -l node
scripts.instantiate-chaincode: docker exec cli peer chaincode instantiate -n fabcar-contract -v 0 -l node -c '{"Args":["org.example.fabcar:instantiate"]}' -C mychannel -P "AND ('Org1MSP.member')"
